name: Pac-Man traproom
description:
Pac-Man, but if you touch the ghosts Pac-Man grows. Avoid touching the ghosts to lower your chances of a game over, and every 10 seconds you shrink, making it easier to avoid the ghosts. Touching Blinky (red ghost) results in game over and he grows every time you do. The other ghosts just make you and Blinky grow.

Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
